name: Double Vision - GameJam 2021 Betray All Expectations
name_original: Double Vision - GameJam 2021 Betray All Expectations
description:
Controls: 

- Move = W, A, S, D
- Jump = Space
- Ranged Attack = Right Mouse Click
- Melee Attack = Left Mouse Click

Instructions:

The world is stuck in a state of double vision and you need to hunt down the cause of issue and destroy it.
Along your adventure you will encounter creatures you will need to defeat to survive. 
Bonus Mission: Find all the lost coins!
